hooks.prompt: Review this session. Did Claude make structural changes (new/renamed routes, changed data models in types.ts, added/modified API endpoints, created new components, changed db.ts, modified config)? If yes AND docs/architecture.md was NOT updated, respond {"decision": "block", "reason": "Structural changes detected but docs/architecture.md was not updated. Please update the relevant section."}. If changes were cosmetic/internal or docs were already updated, respond {"decision": "allow"}. If stop_hook_active appears in context, always respond {"decision": "allow"} to prevent loops.
